title: Posture Corrector for Women Men Kids Teens Posture Support Brace Shoulder Back Support Clavicle Brace Adjustable Figure 8 Training Muscles Spine Improve Posture Upper Back Pain Relief
feature: IMPROVE POSTURE- Depp’s posture brace works by training your muscles and spine to return to their natural alignment, reduce back pain cause by bad posture.
POWERFUL BRACE- Figure 8 integrated design, light and provide huge pulling back strength for shoulders. Velcro allows proper adjustment from 28-48''
COMFORTABLE MATERIAL- Made of high quality extra soft and breathable neoprene, designed in such a way that you can wear it all day.
EASY TO PUT ON- No help from others required to put on or take off, simply pull the straps to be tightened and lift the buckle up to relax the straps.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Your experience with the products is our pursuit. Have no worries, MONEY BACK GUARANTEED if you are not satisfied.
description: ✔️To keep bones and muscles aligned properly. ✔️To reduce mental and physical fatigue and stress. ✔️To prevent backache. ✔️To build up self-confidence. ✔️To own a good habit with sitting, standing or walking. do a great job by helping you pull your shoulders to a more natural position and straighten your back in a scientific way. ✅Comfortable to wear under or over clothes! ✅Perfect for those who spend long hours at the office! ✅Aligns your spine and shoulders upon first wearing it! ✅Soft enough to be used on a daily basis, without cutting the armpits! ✅Easy put on by yourself, dual strap design! ✅Strong yet elastic made from premium quality materials! 👪WE GOT ALL FAMILLY COVERED👪Material: soft and breathable neoprene Chest Circumference: 28–48 inches Color: black Weight: 0.22lb / 100g Package size: 7 x 4.7 x 2.3 inches / 18 x 12 x 6 cm ⚡Add to Cart now to train good posture & be more confident today. ⚡
